bibl.title: Milanese Papyrus No. 46.
Studia Meroitica 1984. Proceedings of the Fifth International Conference for Meroitic Studies. Rome, 1984
bibl.author: Bersina, Svetlana Ya.

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. II, 46 (= Pack2 2214). The papyrus is an official letter or report.
Bersina Svetlana Ya., Milanese Papyrus No. 46.
Sergio Donadoni and Steffen Wenig (Edd.), Studia Meroitica 1984. Proceedings of the Fifth International Conference for Meroitic Studies. Rome, 1984 = Meroitica 10 (1989) pp. 217-224.
